                          /* *******RAHUL MORE********
                             *****N.I.T. DURGAPUR***** */


#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define ll long long
#define l long

#define ins(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define in(s) scanf("%d",&s)
#define inc(s) scanf("%c",&s)
#define inl(s) scanf("%ld",&s)
#define inll(s) scanf("%lld",&s)
#define outs(s) printf("%s\n",s)
#define out(s) printf("%d\n",s)
#define outc(s) printf("%c\n",s)
#define outl(s) printf("%ld\n",s)
#define outll(s) printf("%lld\n",s)
#define lp(i,a,n)  for(i=a;i<n;i++)
#define mal(n) (int*)malloc(sizeof(int)*n)
#define mem(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define gc getchar
#define pc putchar
#define md 1000000007
using namespace std;

ll ar[2000][2000];
int main()
{
ll t,i,j,a,b,len,flag,n,p,m;
memset(ar,-1,sizeof(ar));
inll(m);
inll(n);
inll(p);
lp(i,0,p)
{
    inll(a);
    inll(b);
    ar[a][b]=0;
}
if(ar[1][1]!=0)
flag=1;
else flag=0;
for(i=1;i<m+1;i++)
{
    if(ar[i][1]!=0 && flag==1) ar[i][1]=1;
    if(ar[i][1]==0) flag=0;
    if(flag==0) ar[i][1]=0;
}
if(ar[1][1]!=0)
flag=1;
else flag=0;
for(i=1;i<n+1;i++)
{
    if(ar[1][i]!=0 && flag==1) ar[1][i]=1;
    if(ar[1][i]==0) flag=0;
    if(flag==0) ar[1][i]=0;
}
for(i=2;i<m+1;i++)
{
    for(j=2;j<n+1;j++)
    {
        if(ar[i][j]!=0)
        ar[i][j]=(ar[i-1][j]%md+ar[i][j-1]%md)%md;
    }
}
outll(ar[m][n]);
/*for(i=1;i<m+1;i++)
{
    for(j=1;j<n+1;j++)
    {
       printf("%lld ",ar[i][j]);
    }
    printf("\n");
}*/

return 0;
}
